Each night she’d slept in the room a little longer than the one before, but it seemed impossible to get a whole night’s sleep out of her without hearing a wink.

Until last night. Sure she’d woken up at six in the morning and screamed then instead, but you were willing to accept that. She normally woke an hour later anyway.

The fact that she had slept a whole night was an exciting prospect, especially for Harry.
